name: Colorful African Salad(Abacha)
ingredients: Raw cassava, garden eggs, ugba, titus fish, ogiri, ehuru, omuanya, crayfish, Palm oil
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add your favorite dressing!

name: Cold watermelon juice
instructions: Blend watermelon, add ice and serve.

name: Nigerian Fried Rice
ingredients: Basmati rice, Chicken, Onions, Carrots, Green peas
instructions: Cook rice, make sauce, combine and cook on low heat covered with foil then serve.

name: Sweet pineapple juice
instructions: Blend pineapple, add ice and serve.

name: Calming Chamomile Tea Cake
ingredients: Flour, Chamomile tea bags, Honey, Butter, Eggs
instructions: Infuse milk with tea, mix ingredients, bake for 25 minutes.

name: Lavender Shortbread
ingredients: Butter, Sugar, Flour, Dried lavender, Vanilla
instructions: Mix ingredients, chill dough, cut shapes, bake until golden.

name: Power Protein Bowl
ingredients: Quinoa, Grilled chicken, Kale, Sweet potato, Almonds
instructions: Cook quinoa, grill chicken, combine with vegetables and nuts.

name: Energy Balls
ingredients: Dates, Oats, Peanut butter, Chia seeds, Dark chocolate
instructions: Blend ingredients, form balls, chill for 30 minutes.
